source:
# se define el esquema de tabla
schema = StructType([ 
    StructField('SalesOrderID', IntegerType(), True), 
    StructField('RevisionNumber', ByteType(), True), 
    StructField('OrderDate', TimestampType(), True), 
    StructField('DueDate', TimestampType(), True), 
    StructField('ShipDate', TimestampType(), True), 
    StructField('Status', ByteType(), True),
    StructField('OnlineOrderFlag', ByteType(), True),
    StructField('SalesOrderNumber', StringType(), True),
    StructField('PurchaseOrderNumber', StringType(), True),
    StructField('AccountNumber', StringType(), True),
    StructField('CustomerID', IntegerType(), True),
    StructField('ShipToAddressID', IntegerType(), True),
    StructField('BillToAddressID', IntegerType(), True),
    StructField('ShipMethod', IntegerType(), True),
    StructField('CreditCardApprovalCode', StringType(), True),
    StructField('SubTotal', DecimalType(), True),
    StructField('TaxAmt', DecimalType(), True),
    StructField('Freight', DecimalType(), True),
    StructField('TotalDue', DecimalType(), True),
    StructField('Comment', StringType(), True),
    StructField('rowguid', StringType(), True),
    StructField('ModifiedDate', TimestampType(), True)

coltype_map = { 
    "SalesOrderID": IntegerType(), 
    "RevisionNumber": ByteType(), 
    "OrderDate": TimestampType(), 
    "DueDate": TimestampType(), 
    "Start_Date": TimestampType(), 
    "ShipDate": TimestampType(), 
    "Status": StringType(),
    "OnlineOrderFlag": ByteType(), 
    "SalesOrderNumber": StringType(), 
    "PurchaseOrderNumber": StringType(), 
    "AccountNumber": StringType(), 
    "CustomerID": IntegerType(), 
    "ShipToAddressID": IntegerType(), 
    "BillToAddressID": IntegerType(), 
    "ShipMethod": IntegerType(), 
    "CreditCardApprovalCode": StringType(), 
    "SubTotal": DecimalType(18,4), 
    "TaxAmt": DecimalType(18,4), 
    "Freight": DecimalType(18,4), 
    "TotalDue": DecimalType(18,4), 
    "Comment": StringType(), 
    "rowguid": StringType(), 
    "ModifiedDate": TimestampType()

# course_df6 has all the column 
# types as string 
dfSchema = df.select( 
    [df.cast(coltype_map) 
     .alias(c) for c in df.columns] 
) 
dfSchema.printSchema()
#escribimos un dataframe en modo overwrite a ods
